content: nose arm make 2 make the arms before legs and body round 1 5 single_crochet in a magic_ring 5 round 2 increase x 5 10 round 3 increase 4 single_crochet x 2 12 round 4-7 12 single_crochet 4 rounds 12 round 8 decrease 4 single_crochet x 2 10 stuff lightly with filling round 9 now you will put the stitches together and crochet 5 single_crochet put the stitches together and crochet across 4 round 10 1 chain turn start on the second chain from the hook 5 single_crochet round 11 1 chain turn start on the second chain from the hook 5 single_crochet in the front loops turn and crochet now 5 single_crochet on the same stitches from round 10 but now only on back loops 10 turn back loops front loops from round 10 back loops 10 stitches round 12-25 10 single_crochet 14 rounds 10 stuff lightly with filling round 26 1 single_crochet skip rest of the round and put the stitches together and crochet 5 single_crochet the closing will be on other side compare to the closing further down see picture to right not pointing fasten_off and cut the yarn at the same direction 5 leg make 2 first leg will be fasten_off while second leg will be continued to crochet the body round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase x 6 18 round 4-6 18 single_crochet 3 rounds 18 round 7 decrease 7 single_crochet x 2 16 round 8 decrease 6 single_crochet x 2 14 round 9-11 14 single_crochet 3 rounds 14 round 12 decrease 5 single_crochet x 2 12 round 13-16 12 single_crochet 4 rounds 12 stuff half of the leg lightly with filling round 17 2 single_crochet skip rest of the round and put the stitches together and crochet 6 single_crochet put the stitches together and crochet across 6 round 18 1 chain turn start on the second chain from the hook 6 single_crochet 6 round 19 1 chain turn start on the second chain from the hook 6 single_crochet in the front loops turn and crochet now 6 single_crochet on the same stitches from round 18 but now only on back loops 12 turn back loops from round 18 front loops 12 stitches back loops round 20-26 12 single_crochet 7 rounds 12 stuff lightly with filling round 27 2 single_crochet skip rest of the round and put the stitches together and crochet 6 single_crochet first leg fasten_off and cut the yarn second leg do not cut the yarn you will now continue with the body do not cut the yarn on second leg 7 body continue from the second leg and make 5 chain round 28 attach the chain with 1 single_crochet on the first front loops on the first leg continue and make 5 single_crochet on front loops make sure the yarn tail that you fasten_off with from first leg it s on the inside turn the first leg and continue
